about_the_game:
With 130 pages filled with sketches, concepts, models, and illustrations, the Batora: Lost Haven® Artbook is the official collection of artworks created by Stormind Games’ artists with the crucial contribution of character artist Borislav Mitkov (Assassin’s Creed, Tom Clancy’s H.A.W.X.).

Enjoy this exclusive insight into the game’s elaborate visual style and discover everything about the studies and inspirations that gave life to the Retro Sci-Fi art style of Batora: Lost Haven®, one of the key features of Avril’s emotional journey across colorful and detailed worlds.

The artbook is in PDF format. After purchasing and downloading this DLC, the PDF can be found inside the Batora: Lost Haven® root directory on Steam.
To access this folder, right-click on Batora: Lost Haven® in your Steam library and select ‘properties’. Inside the popup, choose the local files tab and click the browse local files button. You will see the art book in the folder that appears.
